ygData.subject: RE: Brad On Binding (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought we settled this issue... bring extra flutes bag everything and fill as many main slots with extra flutes as you can zone into Ogg get binded there
ygData.messageBody:
I thought we settled this issue...

bring extra flutes
bag everything and fill as many main slots with extra flutes as you can
zone into Ogg
get binded there
duel your friend and get killed
loot every thing except the flutes

Now you have a storage corpse - complete with a night's supply of flutes. Do
this a few times and you will see that the storage corpse and flute thing is
more of a bother than a help and soon you will either selos or sneak by any
bouncers that are not camped.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@...
[mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 12, 2000 5:53 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Brad On Binding (OT)

From: John_Senior@...

I find it an insult that when fighting in Cazic, Guk or the
Sol's I have to
run all the way from Freeport or Arena just to get back to
my corpse,
